text: Anata wa, himitsu no sodan o kinji rareta-sha-tachi ga, sonogo kinji rareta koto ni kaette iru no o minakatta no ka. Kare-ra wa zaiaku to tekii to shito e no han'i to de, mitsugi shitade wanai ka. Mata kare-ra ga anata no moto ni kita toki, arra ga anata ni taishite kesshite aisatsu sa renakatta kotoba (shi o imi suru noroinokotoba nado) de, anata ni aisatsu shite oite (nonoshitte) kara kare-ra wa nakama uchi de,`naze arra wa, watashi-tachi no itta koto o bassanai nodarou ka.' To iu. Kare-ra ni wa jigoku de jubundearu. Kare-ra wa sono Chu de yaka reyou. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo
